EPiServer.PdfPreview

Overview
===========
Pdf Preview is an Episerver addon that allows previewing PDF documents in edit mode.

Installation
===========
Pdf Preview is released as a standard nuget package, please use Visual Studio NuGet console management and run
install-package EPiServer.PdfPreview

Please go to http://world.episerver.com/userguides/ for more topics targeted to editors and merchandisers/marketers, configuration and customization.
